heading: Welcome to the Holmer Green coronavirus distraction scavenger hunt
subheading:
Below is a list of questions that will take you on a little walking tour of our lovely village.
All the answers consist of one or two words, or a number (enter 4 not four).
To save your answers and check how many you have right, just tap a Check Answers button. Have fun!
